entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI failure: JIT PGO ProfileCastClassAndIsInst connection timed out #75867
  • ReadOnlySequence<T> GetOffset does not function correctly with non-zero starting indices #75866
  • Make GC stack walking robust in the presence of unmanaged byrefs with extended lifetime #75865
  • warning CS1685: The predefined type 'System.ObsoleteAttribute' is defined in multiple assemblies in the global alias #75859
  • Inefficient Boolean comparisons on Arm64 #75852
    8.0.0
  • Inefficient Vector128.Equals* comparisons on Arm64 #75849
    8.0.0
  • superpmi-diffs results improvements #75848
    8.0.0
  • Diagnostic support for frozen string literals #75836
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Late expansion of delegate calls can reorder null checks with other argument exceptions #75832
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests - Helix timeout #75830
  • [libraries-pgo] Issues related to overlapped IO #75828
    8.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] BBF_HAS_IDX_LEN is not set ... but is required because of the following tree #75827
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add "FileSystemPath" string syntax type constants to StringSyntaxAttribute #75826
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.GetDtcTransaction #75822
  • Test failure profiler\\gc\\gcbasic\\gcbasic.cmd #75821
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #75820
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b539509/b539509/b539509.sh #75819
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Framework source stepping not working for R2R assemblies in 6.0 Preview 3 #53009
    Future
  • JIT doesn't eliminate redundant branch in guarded span.Slice #65327
    Future
  • System.Net.Security crash on arm64-Mono #75484
    7.0.0
  • SPMI CI runs need to surface context misses #70350
    8.0.0
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failed #64675
    8.0.0
  • [Android] System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField test failure #60558
    8.0.0
  • Android app size regression in .NET 7 RC 1 #75267
    7.0.0
  • Mono JIT/HardwareIntrinsics - Massive failures #75606
    8.0.0
  • Web Assembly Blazor debug issue - Childeren could not be evulated #75763
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Faster Vector128/64 compare on arm64 #75864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #75863
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use clock_gettime_nsec_np if available in GCToOSInterface::GetLowPrecisionTimeStamp #75862
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] KeyChar should be preserved for Ctrl+Letter #75861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Add definition of hostfxr_get_dotnet_environment_info_fn to hostfxr.h #75860
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Publish hostcommon static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Fixing SpanHelpers.LastIndexOfAnyValueType to no longer create out of bounds GC refs #75857
    area-System.Memory
  • Add missing inheritdocs references to IParsable.TryParse #75856
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix querying L3 cache size on osx-x64 #75854
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • KeyChar should be preserved for Ctrl+Letter #75853
    area-System.Console
  • Updating the initial capacity of the intrinsic TypeConverter dictionary #75850
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fail-fast on SuspendThread/ResumeThread failures #75845
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add Vector128:ExtractMostSignificantBits #75844
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix a rare crash when creating or opening named mutexes #75843
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • JIT: move optOptimizeBools later in the phase list #75842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Expand delegate calls in morph #75841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that the VNFunc for HWIntrinsics are properly marked as commutative where possible #75840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Resolve constrained static virtual calls in gshared methods. #75839
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConditionalSelect intrinsics for Amd64 #75838
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][interp] Replace sign extending moves to normal moves #75837
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • replace ToUtf8 with Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes #75834
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #75829
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Faster "obj is T[]" for sealed T #75816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use CommonPrefixLength for SetOf sort validation #75851
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75799
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] hide interop delegates from intellisense #75825
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Fix behavior of JMC #75833
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Bump 7.0 intellisense package version (WinForms docs update) #75786
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • JIT: extend RBO partial inference to unsigned relops #75804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75789
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix FailFast logging message #75718
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Small diagnostics improvements to HostWriter #75593
    area-HostModel, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Fix System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failing test on ARMv6 and Android #75458
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Add doc for CET compatibility. #75551
  • Ensure GenTree::isCommutativeHWIntrinsic works on Arm64 #75818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix grammatical error in #75831. #75835
    area-System.Collections
  • Update List.cs #75831
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Delete unused code #75814
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete some unused includes and files #75805
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix behavior of JMC #75783
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Early expand vtable calls on ARM32 too #75604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] hide interop delegates from intellisense #75800
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Mono]Disable failing intrinsics tests for llvmaot CI lane, due to disabling LLVM JIT #75768
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • No need to try hijack/suspend GC threads #75810
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #75172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add test mode that scans JIT disassembly output #75039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Initialize Volatile value #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #75717
  • Only R2R blittable IL stubs that aren't inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75713
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Add infinite codegen stress feature to crossgen2 and fix memory usage issues found while doing so #74956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `GTF_VAR_CAST` #74461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disallow `ASG(..., IND<struct>)` before morph #74715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75772
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.11
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Prevent exception when attempting to write PaxTarEntry obtained from TarReader #75237
    area-System.IO
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change VerifyXmlResolver to use TcpListener over HttpListener #75369
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Skip frozen segments for commit accounting #75738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ignore ERROR_PIPE_NOT_CONNECTED in WindowsConsoleStream.Write #75734
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disallow TimeSpan.Zero in rate limiters #75496
    area-System.Threading
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Try re-enabling System.Transactions.Local tests on Arm64 #75703
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Transactions
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • AcceptAsync with existing Socket support on Unix, Review Changes #74645
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update System.Formats.Tar docs #75386
    documentation, area-System.IO
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Modernize XmlUTF8TextWriter with u8/inline out's. #75812
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] enable issue 58812 #75444
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • remove explicit LangVersion from a few projects #75806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #75813
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #75774
    area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnablePreviewFeatures not working in 8.0.100-alpha.1.22469.4 #28016
  • Using .cs files like .py files #28014
  • Update the file-conflict message on template instanciation #28013
  • Add optional argument to dotnet new for adding .gitignore #28011
  • Unable to build using <TargetFrameworks> tag on .NET 7 RC1 #28009
  • Cannot pass list of DynamicallyAccessedMembers types #27997
  • IDataRecord.GetFieldType for arrays is not implementable with new DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes contstraints #27990

Closed

  • NU5104: A stable release of a package should not have a prerelease dependency #28001
  • SDK build sporadically failing due to multiple pipelines trying to concurrently upload 'BlobArtifacts/dotnet-toolset-internal-6.0.100-ci.zip' #19679
  • dotnet sdk 6.0.400 issue during "dotnet pack" - it changes variable and then ignores it during build #28000

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent `dotnet test` verbosity from being ignored #27992

Merged

  • [7.0.1xx-rc2 Backport] Fix Runtime Identifiers Assert #28006
    Area-External
  • Check RuntimeIdentifiers in Asserts for Implicit RID Resolution #28005
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1997942 #27904
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Expand existing warning to target 5.0 #27942
    Servicing-consider
  • Improve build stability by ensuring we aren't double publishing everywhere #27899
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make mapping infrastructure unit testable, Ignore effectively sealed members and types and add tests #27962
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Update ubuntu version in template-engine.yml #27951
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Expand existing EOL warning to target 5.0 #27943
    Servicing-consider
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1998023 #27667
  • Add Description to Workload --info #27973
    Area-CLI
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS MSBuild tests are broken and do not run in CI #64132
  • arglist is unnecessarily strict when given RTRS #64130
    C# 12.0
  • No Public API for top-level nullability of members #64123
  • Change RTRS default escape to ReturnOnly #64122
    17.4
  • Preview Changes Dialog Hides Project Information #64116

Closed

  • LSIF tool backward incompatibility #63409
    17.4
  • Lowering of `is (not) null` is opposite to the expected when the block is empty #64118
  • False-positive nullability warning #64117
  • RunTests should not write response files to repo root #63779
    17.4
  • IntelliSense is hard-selecting item not matching the case I'm writing #63922
    17.4
  • API Extensions: ILocalSymbol.IsReadOnly #59709
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to messagepack serialization/deserialization for our ID types #64135
    Area-IDE
  • Fix color issues for Stack Trace Explorer context menu #64134
    Area-IDE
  • Example is not packable #64133
    Area-IDE
  • Fix VisualStudioMSBuildInstalled attribute #64131
    Area-IDE
  • Fix missing Analyzer property ref in build #64129
    Area-Compilers
  • Add service which exists to tell OOP about solution events #64127
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Follow up of #63985 #64126
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enforce new grammar rules that `scoped` keyword must be immediately followed by a type possibly “prefixed” by `ref`/`ref readonly`/`in`/`out`. #64088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • NRT enable our servicehub code. #64128
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade System.Memory to fully fix another MSBuild loading issue #63545
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64121
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unneeded SupportedDiagnostics override #62893
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Minor code cleanup for options #62906
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Set display window to false #64125
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Move test RSP to artifacts directory #64124
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Reorder a few things for clarity #64120
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add `MatchPriority.Deprioritize` and tweak item selection #63985
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run speedometer automatically on PR validation #64097
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove out of proc TodoList computation #64110
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use pattern matching for multi-kind checks #64108
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - struct + a lot of abstracting #64016
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add `ILocalSymbol.IsForEach` and `IsUsing` #64004
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64114
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Consider types with ref fields as managed and Allow pointers of managed types in some contexts #64064
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SymbolDisplay to handle operator symbols that are not valid operators for the target language. #64109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Add ReturnOnly scope #64090
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Semantic snippets - interface snippet #64022
    Area-IDE
  • Enable NRT in analyzers layer #63090
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid a first-chance exception if the PE reference doesn't exist #63878
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Assert option have editorconfig location #62905
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove roaming storage from `RemoveUnnecessarySuppressionExclusions` #62785
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix trivia handling in 'use named arguments' refactoring #63366
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers
  • `scoped` should set ref escape scope to current block #64093
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix parsing of lambda parameter named "scoped" #64085
    Area-Compilers
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942
    Area-IDE
  • Assert unnecessary analyzers derive from AbstractBuiltInUnnecessaryCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62944
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Blocked

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM routing issue #44071
  • Blazor server page route template "catch-all" gives error in case of double asterisk in the pattern #44067
  • DotNetObjectReference multiple instances created, only last one disposed #44064
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, https, plainTextWithFilter #44063
  • BlazorServer doesn't release circuits/component instances after 25mins+forced GC2 #44062
  • GH Issue label descriptions for severity-* labels #44049
  • Android SignalR Java Client - OnErrorNotImplementedException #44046
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json, plaintext_nodejs #44044
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs, plaintext #44043

Closed

  • .NET 7 RC1 blazor WASM size regression #44060
  • Blazor @key not working when inside RenderFragment or Repeater like component #44039
    Discussions
  • Receive an error alert pop when I debug a fresh BlazorWasm app in VS Code #44057
  • mimetype for br and gz files is missing from published web.config WASM app #44053
    Discussions
  • Error "Assembly paths must be rooted" when referencing COM #21480
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Unable to get Offline Auth work #23286
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM PWA's service worker causes issue with OpenID Connect #44023
  • Print the output from the devserver process #42614
    7.0-rc2
  • Android SIgnalR Java Client - OnErrorNotImplementedException #44058
  • Creating TestServer without WebApplicationFactory #44047

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Revert Ubuntu.1804.Armarch.Open change #44074
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Revert Ubuntu.1804.Armarch.Open change #44073
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0
  • Update to stable Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-rtm.22468.5 #44069
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Update the SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22469.4 #44066
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix DetectMisplacedLambdaAttribute analyzer and tests #44061
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Change gRPC JSON to only accept top-level field as request body #44055
    area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `822849d` to `f94b3a5` #44050
    area-infrastructure
  • Add RequestDelegate analyzer #44048
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c29315d` to `1336c4b` #44051
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44034
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Get template error codes from the right processes #44032
    area-mvc, feature-templates, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix the name of the maestro-bot user. #44042
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1997961 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cant add Pin to Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps Pin collection after page is loaded using Android app #10212
  • TextCell's Font Icon #10211
  • Android setting Image.Source to null does not remove previous image. Also iOS does not always show the image. #10210
  • CollectionView does not allow clicking of child elements #10209
  • Picker behavior on Mac Catalyst #10208
  • TapGestureRecognizer not working if child element has InputTransparent = "True" #10207
  • Document that KeepScreenOn in Android requires Window #10206
  • Icon tab menu navigation don´t change #10205
  • under iOS, "parent.InputTransparent = false" does not propagate to children as it should #10203
    Backlog
  • The ResourceDictionary has duplicate template options #10202
  • [Bug] Binding value to IsVisible of FlexLayout raises System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException on Windows #10198

Closed

  • Cannot pair to mac after latest VS2022 Windows update #10157
  • Blazor .NET MAUI WPF `MissingMethodException` #10199
  • Odd behaviour dragging window OR anything (sortable lists, etc) #10185
  • Running App in Android Simulator won't deploy app(Takes long time) #8882
  • facing issue and that is : installation while downloading .net maui #10045
  • Maui Shell always re-uses pages. No option to re-create on navigation #10164
    Backlog
  • [Android] Build fails when using a MAUI class library #10200
  • Errors in try/catch kill the application when there is no internet #9977
  • `Image` inside `Border` is rendered differently in XAML vs. Custom Control #10000
    Backlog
  • Background Color for Label and entry does not update when removing the existing color #10177
    7.0
  • Can't run iOS simulator, in spite of being successfully connected to Mac. #10085

PullRequests

Created

  • [Tizen] Update Shell to handle FlyoutHeaderBehavior #10201
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Merged

  • Set BackgroundColor for Label and a few others on templates #10184
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10178
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [documentation] Fix typo #10187
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, .NET 7 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TemporalAll for temporal owned entities mapped to parent table. #29156
  • AsNoTracking() performs partial identity resolution #29152
  • Index incorrectly named in migration #29151
  • Database.EnsureCreated() force create multiple schemas #29144
  • Support using a single sproc per concrete type regardless of the inheritance mapping strategy #29143
    Backlog
  • Owned Entity throws InvalidOperationException inside RelationalSqlTranslatingExpressionVisitor.TryRewriteEntityEquality #29142
  • How to use EF Core in applications targeting .NET Framework 4.8 after EF Core 3.1 end of support? #29136

Closed

  • Query: Reduce indentation in SqlTranslator #28098
    MQ
  • CLI dbscaffold not correctly scaffolding many-to-many relationships #29101
  • EFCore's error handling is useless and leads to loss of productivity and frustration! #29034
  • Synapse database first approach - FUNCTION OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME not supported #29137
  • Optimistic concurrency exception from stored procedure logs error #29135
    8.0.0
  • DetectChanges works incorrect when update nested owned entity #29085
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Column order not scaffolded as attribute #29007
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Stop fixing up to Deleted entities #28249
    7.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Readme #29160
    auto-merge
  • [release/7.0] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 - missed parts #29159
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 #29158
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 #29157
    area-infrastructure
  • Cleanup in EF.Property #29154
  • Allow specify property value without lambda in ExecuteUpdate #29139
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0-rc2

Merged

  • Reduce indentation in SqlTranslator #29155
    auto-merge
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29145
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:, 7.0.0-rc2
  • Async fix for "Generate values for PK properties that are also self-referencing FK properties" #29134
    Servicing-approved
  • Don't fixup to deleted entities #29133
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Don't scaffold HasColumnOrder #29126
    Servicing-approved
  • Templates: Specify a groupIdentity for ef-templates #29118
    Servicing-approved
  • Sproc test fixes around concurrency tokens #29138
    tell-mode
